Open the "Retro Music" application, displaying the main interface with options like "History", "Last added", "Most played", and "Shuffle".
Click the "Playlists" icon at the bottom right to navigate to the Playlists screen.
Click the three dots icon to open the options menu.
Click "New playlist" to create a new playlist.
Click the "Playlist name" text field to bring up the keyboard and allow input.
Type "My Favorites" into the playlist name field.
Click "Create" to save the new playlist named "My Favorites".
Click on "My Favorites" to view the playlist details.
Click the three-dot menu to reveal options for the playlist.
